Welcome to Sac State's Data Science Club


Our mission is to bring together Sac State students who are interested in data science to learn more about different technologies and tools, and make some really cool projects!


About Us

News

Connect With Us

About Us


Data Science is the intersection of computer science, math, statistics, and machine learning.

The purpose of the club is to give students a background on data science through lectures and discussions, connect with alumni working as data scientists, and have hangouts to work on projects to build your resume and learn new concepts.

Our tentative plan is meet in Riverside 5029 from 12-1 on Monday, starting February 8th. This may change though so please follow this page for updates
